ModMetaData.name: RimPLD
ModMetaData.author: Solra Bizna
ModMetaData.description:
A programmable logic device for RimWorld. Perform simple logic operations compactly and reliably. One simple use case is to automatically turn a generator on and off based on battery status.
Select up to three input sources A/B/C (which are available inverted and non-inverted), provide up to three outputs X/Y/Z. Internally, it has eight AND gates, three OR gates, and an SR latch. The state of the SR latch acts as a fourth input, and can also control output X.
This is not meant as a full replacement for PowerLogic. It *can* replace PowerLogic for many uses.
(Players of SHENZHEN I/O may find that the RimPLD bears a suspicious resemblance to the PGA33x6 from SHENZHEN I/O. If you ever looked at the PGA33x6 and thought "wow, that looks cool, wish I had a use for it", well, now you can do that in RimWorld too.)
